website_summaries.verdict: A winning combo of natural ingredients that effectively reduces shedding.
pros: Delivers ingredients such as omega fatty acids and natural plant extracts to condition dog's skin and fur
Doesn't contain chemical dyes or parabens
cons: Monthly usage is recommended, which could get a bit costly over time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shampoo for your pooch
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! Now my german sheperd is already a shedder, but when i bathed her using this shampoo, so so much hair came coming out. Never did as much hair come out before like it did this time. And then theres still clumps that will be laying on the floor. The product smells nice and works as intended. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Use with matching conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product! My dog sheds a ton, but after using this shampoo and the matching conditioner, he's shedding so much less and his coat is significantly softer. I left the product on for five minutes (continued rubbing it in while waiting), and the results are truly stand-out! I'm having to vacuum far less often and my Roomba (robot vacuum) is picking up significantly less of his hair. Plus, it smells great! I'm planning on bathing him once a month with the shampoo & conditioner for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo for my Pug!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my initial bottle at Petsmart after seeing that the groomers there offer the "furminator" package and I figure I would just buy the shampoo and and conditioner and do it myself. For this system to work is important to brush your dog and get all the loose hair out, then bathe your pup and let the shampoo and conditioner for 5 minutes or longer and then rinse. Out of all the shampoos i use on my pug, this one works great, leaves no residue, helps with shedding and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Kman

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy this shampoo! Major hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the negative (correct) reviews before purchasing this and using it on my dog. Like some of the other reviews I was satisfied with the shampoo in the beginning but now after a few days I noticed excessive shedding and when I examined her skin it was covered in hot spots and red bumps. Parts of her back are now so irritated that her fur is coming out in clumps and I can see her skin from so much fur loss. I almost can't believe the condition her skin is at right now after just a few days. She went from shiny and normal to balding and inflamed. Very regretful.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Save your pet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a deshedding from Percocet and it was working, but I wanted something with a nicer scent. I bought this because of the ratings... but both of my dogs, two completely different breeds, broke out in a terrible rash after using this. Their skin peeled off for a week after use of the product. Their fur does get extremely soft, but at what cost!?!?! PROTECT your DOG!!!! Side affects are AWFUL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryalice

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Crappy stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, crappy stuff! My dog naturally sheds quite a bit . After months of brushing him with furminator and having him professionally bathed, his shedding became almost none. I saved money by bathing him myself at a self dog wash. The two previous times I used the shampoo the dog wash offered. No shedding problems. I bought this de-shedding shampoo because of the reviews and I wanted something that actually tackles the dog shedding. Omg! I’ve only used this 1 time and his shedding avalanche has returned! I am so disappointed. Now I’m am back at tackling his shedding problem and it appears to be worst than before. Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to claims
customer_reviews.text: Used on 1/2 great Pyrenees, 1/4 Anatolian Shepard and 1/4 Plott hound when before we would have large white hair tumbleweeds daily we now have hair mostly falling off onto surfaces and our clothing when puppy rubs up against use. It does have a floral fragrance that is noticible to human noses that lasts a few days post bath so might not be the best thing for especially sensitive dogs, but I love the reduction in musty dog drool scent that my pup most often carries. Using the full set leaves fur silky soft Do yourself and your dog a favor by following up with deshedding brushes to reduce undercoat density for the double coated dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for shedding!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a Border Collie/Pit mix, and he was shedding a lot. At first we attributed it to getting rid of crappy hair from crappy food and adoption process stress, but after a while, he was still shedding like crazy. A fried recommended the Furminator combo (make sure you also get the conditioner), and it's incredible! It significantly reduced his shedding! We tried good food, frequent brushing, essential oils on his coat...nothing worked like this did. Note: you do have to leave each product in for 10 minutes, so this could be difficult depending on you and your dog. We just stayed with him, petting him and giving him treats.
customer_reviews.author: b.peltz27Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Dog Hair :)
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd give this a try on my English (white) Golden Retriever and HOLY COW what a difference!! Hair was just coming off her in clumps. It was great. She was actually white again and smelled so good. I also used the conditioner on her and that worked great too. The next day I brushed her with the FURminator brush and she was so soft. Her hair was light and fluffy and was the softest its ever been. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who has a dog with long hair. It works and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Steffens

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wrote good review before after I used once as first time used the shampoo conditioner it seemed to work amazing but every time since not so much plus it’s hard to leave this stuff on your dogs coat for a full 5 minutes as they are wet and get cold which makes a simple bath turn into a big project. Even got the waterless spray to use in between as recommended and a special brush but made no difference to anything but my wallet
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have two beautiful 2yr old pugs. Although they are the cutest and most loving dogs I’ve ever encountered, they are shed monsters!! They have a year round double coat and shed like schenanagans. I can’t wear black and constantly have a lint roller in arms reach. I was hoping this shampoo and conditioner combo would be the answer to my prayers of wearing black again... but I didn’t notice a difference in their shedding. They were softer though.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: My dog has numerous itchy, hotspots after using this shampoo. Her fur was also coming out in big clumps. I do not recommend this product at all. She is not particularly sensitive to shampoo- we usually use human shampoo with no problem. If I could give this zero stars I would. Our other dog had no issues with it- but it is not worth the risk. DON’T DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelsons

customer_reviews.title: Its poison
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the one star negative reviews! 12 hours after bathing my dog with the shampoo I notice a balding wet pus spot on his back. After looking up the worst case scenarios on google I attributed this to the new shampoo. And lo and behold I look at the bad reviews for this product and it's a VERY common reaction to dogs of various breeds. Avoid this poison
customer_reviews.author: YeahBoy

customer_reviews.title: Dirty packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because my dog sheds tremendously and the furminator has been a really good brand for us. I have the brush and love it. The shampoo smells amazing. Like a pina colada I haven’t used it yet** but the bottle came coated in shampoo as if the top was loose or something. Idk how it got dirty because the top hole is not coated in shampoo. Even the bag it came it was coated in it. The packaging company should never be sending their customers dirty products, it’s just common sense. I will write another review one I use it within the next few days. Hopefully the product shines through the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Wise One

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to work so bad. My Scottish terrier is currently shedding entire carpets, his hair is in EVERYTHING. I brushed, bathrd him with this and let it sit. He lost alittle more than usual in the tub but not much. Brushed again. Vacuumed him and he got a 2nd session. All this shampoo did was make him shed even worse all over my home than he was BEFORE! 0 stars. It smells good though......
customer_reviews.author: Chezby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! Truly did not expect the amount of hair that was removed with this shampoo. My dog has American Alaskan in her and has a very thick coat. I've used the Furminator deshedding comb with success, but nothing compares to the shampoo. She has never felt more sleek and I can pet her without hair flying everywhere. I used the recommended brush that gets the shampoo deep into her coat and found it was easier to add the shampoo directly to her than filling the reservoir in the brush. Left on for ten minutes like instructed and hair was melting off her. I know she has to feel better, too.
customer_reviews.author: MK Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dog Had Terrible Reaction - Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers mentioned, my dog ended up with large scabs and extreme discomfort from itching from using this shampoo. Used it as directed and almost 2 weeks later the scabs are still not fully healed and she is still scratched. I gave her a cool water bath right about a day and a half after noticing the wounds and that seemed to help only slightly. Would not recommend this at all. Very very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Woman who buys too many random things on this website

customer_reviews.title: Significant decrease in shed
customer_reviews.text: I have always had labradors, and they shed like crazy !!! My current dog is a red fox lab. I thought for a while that maybe she wasn't going to shed as bad as my previous Yellow labs. but when she turned 4 the shedding started!! Anyway I tried this shampoo and conditioner and let me tell you it works amazingly well! Wish I would have had it with my previous dogs!! It doesn't completely stop the shedding, I doubt there is any product out there that does that, but it significantly decreased the amount of shed. In addition, it leaves her coat very soft and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Tamham

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in shedding, very shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I don’t know if you can tell from the before and after photos (after is by the door), but this has had incredible results. I recommend using this in combination with the furminator brush. I brushed before her bath, gave her a bath with this shampoo (used some oatmeal conditioner as well). I let her dry, and brushed her again the next day. This is after a little over a week, plus a couple of brushes. Her coat looks so shiny and she’s shedding a lot less. I can pet her without having lots of hair come off. It’s a huge difference. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Gosh darn does this work.
customer_reviews.text: I almost wished it didn’t work so well. If you use this buy a bottle of draino as well, your going to need it. Works on my short hair Chiweenie and my 50lb Harrier (he is my golden shedder). You need both the shampoo and the conditioner, but BE WARNED!!!!! Be prepared to clean up a massive amount of dog hair for the next couple of days. As my dogs will NOT allow me to blow dry them so as they dry the shed even more. Can’t say it enough it’s the only thing that works on my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: I have eczema and my dog has dander...read the review!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. First off my dog: a chihuahua. She had bad pet dander and sheds a bunch (like so much that her hair can be seen in piles on my floor daily). Secondly for myself: this is awesome shampoo. I suffer from eczema and it left MY skin feeling soft. The smell is subtle and not overpowering. It's a soft, natural scent. I've used it for a few weeks on my dog and I've noticed and incredible difference...not only with less shedding, but also with less dander. You need to leave the shampoo on your pet for at least 5 minutes. It suds up nicely with water and rinses out really well. I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Stdcam13

customer_reviews.title: My dog has never been cleaner, smelled better and he is a sensitive pup.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't shed but I use this shampoo anyway. This is an amazing dog shampoo that doesn't irritate but still gets the dirt out of the hair/skin. Dog comes out really clean and has a lovely smell. My terrier seems to get cleaner with this shampoo than with any of the other tens I have tried (over the past 8 years!). I don't have to clean him as often. The conditioner is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Works so much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the FURminator deShedding shampoo and conditioner to use on my 3 pugs because they shed so much you would think I had 6 of them. I followed the directions letting shampoo sit for 5 mins before rinsing and then did the same with the conditioner. The shampoo and conditioner both smell great and it worked better than I could ever imagine. So much fur came off in the bath and now there’s barely hair coming off of them. It’s been a few days since bathing them and I can still smell the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Shariece

customer_reviews.title: Smell is dog torture and too smelly for us too.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it to work as advertised for my double coated border collie. Realistically it didn’t loosen anymore hair than any other shampoo. And the smell! Why do they load these things down with such heavy perfume? Dogs sense of smell is about 1000 times that of ours and it must be pure torture for them if we can hardly stand it. A week later I can still smell it on him. Won’t be ordering more and can’t wait for this smell to fade off of him. He is clean and shiny though! Use both the shampoo and conditioner. Tossing the other half of the bottles as I can’t bear to see that happen to any other dog.
customer_reviews.author: troutnut1

customer_reviews.title: DeShedding seems to work
customer_reviews.text: This product was used with de shedding shampoo. Item arrived quickly and packaged well. Scent is nice upon application. My dog seemed fine with products, product left on for recommended 5-10 minutes before rinsing. No reactions, bright coat, perfume remaining after rinsing. I’m not a fan of lingering perfumed scent, otherwise I am happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: costcontrol

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!! Rich lather
customer_reviews.text: I have short haired dogs and I did not purchase this for shedding but I purchased it because it was on sale for a great price and I go through tons of shampoo. I have two Dogo Argentinos who play outside all day and come in completely caked in mud. This shampoo smells great and lathers up nice and rich which I love. I have used every kind of dog and human shampoo and conditioner known to man and nothing gets these dogs as white as this shampoo does! If you told me it was a whitening formula I would believe it. I came here to buy some more bottles of this and decided to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: VMH

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works! I’ve been using harts purple shampoo from Walmart because it smells good, but wow what a difference. Yesterday My shower drain clogged because of all the fur from my dog undercoat. He is still shedding today, but I’ve been brushing him. I’m sure after a few uses I imagine the shedding will be less, since he was chock full of fuzz. Also the conditioner is the magic. You HAVE to use both to get maximum results. It releases the undercoat. I only bought the shampoo at first, but decided to get the conditioner too since it’s not expensive. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wise

customer_reviews.title: No buy!
customer_reviews.text: One application and overnight my dog looks like this. His neck is swollen and very irritated. They apparently changed the formula for the shampoo. Please be careful purchasing this! UPDATE: It's been about a week since we used this shampoo on our dog. He now has bald patches where his fur has been falling out as can be seen in the second picture.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Comforting Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Fletcher, our senior bloodhound, had a bath today at the vets with this Furrminator shampoo b/c he sheds so incredibly. Too early to say whether it actually reduces shedding but his coat is soft and clean-no residue. And, he isn't itching or scratching as he does often after a bath-that is a very nice blessings.....this could be a great shampoo. I will follow up with update. Fletcher's momma
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt seem to help with the shedding at all, if anything it just makes them shed more, been using it for about a month and a half and the shed has never been worse, no amount of brushing seems to help and it makes the dander sooo much worse, I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Toña

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for all of my  dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried countless shampoos for my lab/husky mix in the 13 years I’ve had him and I’ll never use anything else but this. I do use it on my other dogs too. (Shitzu poodle mix and a terrier shitzu mix). It helps with the shedding tremendously but also makes them super soft, not sticky and they stay clean longer than with other shampoos. I use it year round. The conditioner is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Better Price Than Pet Store, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Our yellow lab sheds so much, and we had already accepted that as a matter of life. I bought this shampoo thinking it was worth a try, but I didn't expect much. This shampoo far exceeded our expectations. It's been a few weeks since we last bathed him with it, and it still seems to be working. We aren't vacuuming up as much dog fur, and we aren't seeing him shed nearly as much. He still sheds some, but this shampoo has done more for us than even daily brushing do. At this price, it's worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!! Just like other reviews this left my dog severely itchy with scabs. I have used the same shampoo purchased in person from a pet store and did not have the same reaction. $4 you get what you pay for. Most likely fake and dangerous chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: Causes visible sores and irritation
customer_reviews.text: Great for the first day after giving my dog a bath, but then my dog started to develop bumps all over his back. These bumps started to scab and he showed visible signs of irritation. The first time these symptoms arose it did not occur to me that the shampoo was the cause. However, after the second time giving my dog a bath with it the same thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Contreras

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my English Labrador Retriever and Golden Retriever. Arrived quickly and in good condition. Leaves my dogs with beautiful coats and smells amazing! Some days its a little harder to scrub the dogs for 10 minutes with the shampoo on the dog (especially when using in conjunction with the conditioner) but the results are totally worth it. Found it at a great price point and will be ordering again. My dogs look and smell AWESOME! Would recommend to my dog owning friends. Last night's bath really worked this shampoo and conditioner to it's fullest potential, getting rid of lots of loose fur for their spring shedding! Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: YetiFish

customer_reviews.title: Misleading. Have to have the conditioner to activate shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three dogs. I'll start by saying the smell is so amazing. It smells tropical like tanning lotion and Coconuts. My boyfriend hated it. And it made them so SOFT. BUT it didn't work. I talked with a groomer and they said the shampoo alone doesn't get all that fur off that's it's the conditioner that activates it and pulls it off. So it's great as a shampoo and I'll buy the conditioner but the labeling is really misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Use shampoo&conditioner. Let shampoo sit-I massage our dogs for at least 5 minutes then rinse and condition. Brushing them out first helps too. Hair will shed in clumps in the sink. May see worse shedding immediately after. Blow drying and brushing afterwards will reduce this. It’s just the treatment working. Once they get through that mine don’t shed until they need another bath-generally a couple weeks. Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but scent not good
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once so we’ll have to see how it goes in the future but it does NOT have a nice scent at all. I ordered because I’m washing my dog now during COVID while all groomers are closed, and I’d hoped she’d be all fresh and nice smelling like she is after groomers after using this to bathe her, but no...it’s an odd scent. Not terrible but far from nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I got this on a lightning deal or what, but I paid $3.49 and this stuff is $14.99 at the local "big box" pet stores! What an amazing deal! It smells really nice, and my dog's coat is very soft after using it. I'm not sure if it will really reduce shedding, but it does seem to have some high quality ingredients like fruit extracts and Omega 3 & 6 fatty acids.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected & pleasantly surprised by the efficacy!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is excellent. It got my pup super clean and smelling great without smelling too perfumed. His short hair was already super soft so I didn’t expect him to get silkier. He did! He’s so smooth and soft. The “deshedding” feature had my suspicions raised as well, but he is actually barely shedding at all now. He has really sensitive skin and a lot of allergies too, so the fact that he didn’t have any bad reaction or break outs was impressive. Great bargain and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have an alaskan malamute, and anyone who lives with a double coated dog knows how rough it can be. My boy sheds so bad that I have to vacuum everyday. After use of this shampoo, within 3 hours (how long it usually takes for his coat to completely dry) he dropped almost as much dead fur as he does during coat blowing season (piles of the stuff that just get everywhere) but even after that first wash, his coat was noticeably softer, sleeker, and his skin was less irritated. For the price, this is more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This smells really good, and it definitely helps with the shedding. I brushed my dog right after the bath and a lot of hair came off. This will definitely help keep the house clean. I read some reviews about the product hurting dogs skin, and making them scab or burn. I didn't have this problem. My dogs skin is fine, and his fur is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: My dog started losing hair in spots. I saw a small one developing on her ribs. Another below her neck. The one under her neck became very red, and she a lost a lot of hair. She also developed seborrhea, which was a side effect of the infection this shampoo gave her! Brought her to the vet ASAP, where she needed to get a shot for the infection, and she needed a special bath for the next 5 days. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deshedding or super shedder?
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was going to shed the hair off our German Shepard in the bath or at least prevent shedding. It seemed like all the shedding happened AFTER the bath. Had to do a lot of vacuuming for a few days. He shed so much, I’m afraid to use it again. Not because I’m worried about my dog going bald but because of all the hair left around the house.
customer_reviews.author: AmmozonTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Help With Shedding
customer_reviews.text: This did release fur. It smells like coconut, which I happen to like. If you don't, stay away from this. This seems to help with shedding. Not my favorite shampoo. It requires a conditioner for my dogs. I hated the Furminator conditioner, which left their fur feeling extremely rough instead of silky. I have 2 pomapoo puppies that shed (unfortunately).
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have 2 white short hair dogs and cherry colored hardwood floors so they look like it snowed on them all the time. I have to vaccum 2 to 3 times a day. Surprisingly after using this shampoo 1 time I spent have to vaccum for 3 days. I am shook. My dogs wrestle and rumble around all the time and has saved me several hours a week of vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Dasia Stigger

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic! I always pay the extra price to get my German Shepard de-shed using this same exact shampoo/conditioner combo but for $100 a month it was getting way to expensive so I figured I’d try it at home especially at this price. I can honestly say I think I did a better job because I took my time to really let it set in as it says rather than the groomer probably rushes through the project. I can honestly say that her coat feels fantastic, is so shiny, she smells heavenly, and the shedding subsided for way longer than I even expected (about 4 weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castro

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it works !!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had been shedding like crazy and I wasn’t sure why . So I changed his food started making him more omega 3 filled foods still shedding. I used this product twice. Along with the conditioner and spray . I’m telling you it worked. I was even surprised myself . I totally recommend getting the bundle with shampoo, conditioner and spray. Works great
customer_reviews.author: smartlady

customer_reviews.title: A-Mazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this but I just used it for the first time a week ago and the results were unreal. My dog (lab mix) is a MAJOR shedder and after just one use of this her shedding has become almost non-existent. I did keep the product on her for five minutes which felt like a long time but it worked. Not sure how long it will last but will be happy to do this monthly if it continues to work as well as it has for the first week.
customer_reviews.author: James Nation

customer_reviews.title: Top selling product at most grooming salons
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that sheds, I would greatly recommend this product with the furminator conditioner. It will release all that under coat your dog is carrying and leave a soft and shiny coat. I've been working for a grooming salon for 3 years now and this is one of our top selling packages. You will not be disappointed, but please follow the directions for best results. I personally let the shampoo/conditioner set for 10-15 minutes and once the dog is dried, brush out with the Furminator deshedding brush. I promise it works.
customer_reviews.author: Serina Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Easy On, Miserable Off
customer_reviews.text: Applies great and has a lovely smell but this is horrific to rinse out of our Siberians. Both my dogs loved bath time until encountering this shampoo. They don't mind the application so much as the effort required (lather, rinse, rinse, rinse, rinse, rinse, rinse) to soak it from their fur. The repetition causes them to rebel against me and to hide from future baths! No bueno. The results almost make it worth the effort. But transforming my bath-happy pups into kids fleeing the first day of school forces me to seek something, anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cav King Charles Spaniel, and she cries or yelps when I used this brush on her as though it is actually PULLING her hair out. I don't know what to think, but I'm really sorry I spent the money on this expensive brush, and I cannot use it. I will not hurt her even if does mean that I have to clean up her hair every day. BTW, she doesn't make a fuss when I use her regular brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Permenter

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Ummmmmm wow is all I have to say. I fallowed the directions to a T and the amount of hair that came off my dog was nothing short of insane!! Highly recommend just make sure you fallow the directions and I think you’ll be impressed. I’m not sure if it matters but I’ll share that my dog is very short haired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy ****. I’ve got 4 large dogs 2 have long hair so the shedding was getting out of hand. I ordered this ($3 such a steal!) washed them and the tub was so full of hair. Waited about a week and washed them again and there was barely any hair falling off them! The shedding is SO much more manageable now and their coats look so healthy. Also it smells good unlike most dog shampoos even
customer_reviews.author: A321

customer_reviews.title: Got shedders ? Get this now!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a limb and bought this shampoo because I have two dogs who shed like it’s their business. One of my pups have serious skin issues and is extremely sensitive so trying new products can be scary, but I’ve been using this product for roughly two months now and havent had any Issues with irritation or her allergies. Now though this isn’t much more than a bandaid it helps. Neither of my dogs like to be brushed so bathing them with this helps cut down on the extra fur loss a lot! I was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog shampoo! In combination with the conditioner, I am able to get large chunks of hair off of the dog which dramatically reduces shedding when they are dry. The smell is fantastic too and it is not drying. I am a huge fan and recommend to everyone I know with dogs!
customer_reviews.author: EV92

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy shampoo it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I have a short haired chihuahua in white he sheds a lot I bought this shampoo but this shampoo is garbage don’t waste you’re money on it my chihuahua still sheds a ton. I bought the deluxe brush but it’s not great for short haired chihuahua’s.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Caused hot spots but reduced shedding
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Gave our dog two rounds of hot spots within days of using it. He had never had hot spots before so we didn’t catch them early. $1000 and two sedations later were using a calming shampoo from the vet and have had no further hot spot issues. We definitely won’t be using Furminator shampoo and conditioner ever again on any of our dogs, but doesn’t sound like this is an issue for other reviewers. Pros: did seem to release hair and reduce shedding for a week or two after use.
customer_reviews.author: polly jewett

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this stuff! I use this and the cordinating conditioner along with a rubber brush in the tub to scrub down our english bulldog and pug (they love getting scrubbed) and ive noticed there is less and less hair in the drain hair catcher amd after a bit, a lot less around my house if i keep up and bath them every 2-3 weeks. Smells good, coats get compliments. Love love love :) (ive been using for a long time now, but needing to reorder so figured id leave a review)
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Marie

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible soap. At best it is good when you have nothing else to use for your dogs. It does not clean well, and does not leave a nice smell. DEFINITELY does nothing for shedding! Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for your house to look like a fur snow globe
customer_reviews.text: One word... Wow! We have a aussie husky mix that is just turning a year old. For some reason, as the weather got cooler, he was shedding like mad. I washed him with the shampoo and conditioner and thought I would just wait until the next day to brush him out. I didnt realize what I was setting myself up for! This shampoo works AMAZING... maybe even too good. Make sure you set time aside to brush as soon as they are out of the bath or dried off otherwise, your house will be even furrier than the reason that made you get the shampoo in the first place! The hair wont stop coming! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stine

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: I was really sceptical on this working. My dog has a double coat and sheds like a cheap wig. I washed him with it today and did it twice in the same bath. I brushed him like crazy while the shampoo was on and I got almost an entire dog of hair off of him. I have not had one stray hair from him for the rest of the day. I even let him on the bed. I never do that because he sheds so much. I am very pleased with this product. A+ #1 super good best shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Helps loosen the undercoat. Great for Heavy undercoat dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use the FURminator shampoo. But sometimes I use it just because I know it’s going to give moisture for the last shampoo. I bathe them at least twice. If it’s a dog with a thick coat (like a lab )this will loosen a lot of the undercoat and a lot will fall out! I use it on one of my German Shepherd’s, her problem is the undercoat! Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Less shedding
customer_reviews.text: I only got this a few weeks ago. But I’ve used it on my dogs twice and they seem to be shedding less. The worst thing about it is the product has to sit on your dog 5-10 minutes and my dogs both HATE getting baths. So trying to keep them in the tub is hard. But the smell is amazing, they are really soft and they shed less. So I can’t complain. Hopefully the longer I use it the less they shed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Eismont

customer_reviews.title: Beware....
customer_reviews.text: I have six dogs of various breeds, sizes and coats. I tried it on all of them and two out of the six ended up with hives and rashes...On Amazon purchasing Hot spot cream to alleviate the issue! Not sure if it really worked at minimizing the shedding on the other four. Will not be buying again...Going in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: A BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs. One of them is a husky. I bought this with the conditioner hoping it would help with the constant shedding. I had read this shampoo will help with the bulk of shedding and then it would be minimal for a few weeks. I used it last night and as soon as the pups dried, the shedding was instant. 100% recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Rashes, redness, allergic.
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good, and after using the fur is really soft. However, I switched to this brand and used it for three times, my dog starts to get rashes and very itchy. I usually bath my dog, and the last time my wife did it and she got allergic to the product, her hand and wrist became very itchy and so red. So I would say, use it at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Liu

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy I made all year
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs and were going through a bi-yearly shed fest. I decided to look into a new shampoo that might help, and I am so glad I did!! After the first bath we saw a dramatic decrease in the amount of hair all over the house. I would recommend this product to anyone who had a dog shedding problem. This was the best purchased that I made all year!
customer_reviews.author: mimi3535

customer_reviews.title: Loved by professional dog groomers!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a professional dog groomer, and this stuff works!! Nothing takes away all the shedding of course, but this stuff and the conditioner really make a huge difference. The key is mostly in the conditioner, you rub it in to the coat, then use a dog dryer (NO heat) to blow the conditioner into the coat backwards, next rinse out completely and again use the dryer. I like the fact that the ingredients are not full of all kinds of crazy chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo, not diluted at all!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo doesn’t take a ton of shampoo to work up a nice lather. I felt like I was using half the bottle of other brands to wash one dog. I’ve washed both dogs several times and maybe 1/4 of the way through the bottle. They do have a ton of fur but I’m super satisfied. It smells good and also leaves the white in their collars and paws nice and white. I can’t say if it helps with shedding because my dogs apparently shed a ton no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Bethay

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo alone will get quite a bit of loose coat out.
customer_reviews.text: The picture I attached is with just the shampoo alone! I absolutely love furminator shampoo and it's even better when you use it with the furminator conditioner!!! The hair just comes out in clumps!! I'm always amazed at how much hair comes off in just the bath alone. I also use a zoom groom brush in the bath as well as when I dry my dogs with a pet dryer. This shampoo and conditioner always makes such a difference! Their coats are so soft and the shedding is reduced!
customer_reviews.author: Rina T.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this shampoo. I have two dogs- one with short hair and one with a double coat. My one with the short hair had a severe allergic reaction to this shampoo. Itching, redness, and open wounds. I had to give her 2 extra bathes using the oatmeal shampoo I already had for her to get the reaction to calm down and go away. I also rubbed her wounds and any redness down with coconut oil to help ease the irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqi

customer_reviews.title: This Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a pet groomer, and it’s been amazing! My rough coated border collie’s coat comes out soft without the need for conditioning, and smelling great from the natural oils in it! I give him a good brushing once dried to get out any loose fur, and he’s good to go until I groom him again. I don’t notice clumps of black or white hair anywhere in between.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked far better than I had expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of purchasing this as we have always used regular people shampoo on our dogs. We adopted a coonhound who sheds like crazy and has a bit more oil to her skin. This product surprised me and I am sold on it now! We do see a reduction in shedding after we bathe her with this. Brushing her out following a bath is crazy! She has very short hair but a lot of it comes off after a bath and her coat is soft and white again. Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: nic286

customer_reviews.title: Kinda helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have a husky that sheds A LOT. I bought this shampoo to help with her shedding. While bathing her I did notice her hair coming off that she would otherwise shed. I honestly thought this shampoo would be a lot more helpful but didn’t make much of a difference compared to her normal shampoo
customer_reviews.author: IGR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! We have a full bred Siberian Husky and there is always so much hair! I was taking him to the groomer, but that gets pricey over time and inconvenient so I finally asked them what they are using to wash him and they recommended this. It has been a life saver. I use this and the Furminator Brush when he is dry and he won't shed much for a few weeks until it's bath time again. I highly recommend this to any fur baby parents that are reaching their wits end with the hair, but love their fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amber LackieTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great at de-shedding ; Dries out dog's coat
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between three and four stars on this one. While I do like the shampoo and how it helps "shed" the dogs coat it makes his fur extremely dry. I have tried a few other brands, and have had similar results. The scent of the shampoo is great and it does make it soft. But the dryness is definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: NerdySportsGuy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't really feel clean after using this. It also hardly smells at all. I've seen zero effect on the shedding. The product wants you to leave it in for 10 minutes before washing your dog. How many dogs are going to sit around for 10 minutes with shampoo in their fur? That's just not thinking with your brain on that design.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Lanich

customer_reviews.title: Want to clear the shedding mess ? Use this product
customer_reviews.text: At this point I have not received my order but it’s a repeat order definitely highly recommended this product for dogs that shed. I advise if you bathe your pet in tub use a strainer for the fur that will come off your animal . The excess fur removed will make your dog or cat so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Worked For About 3 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I gave my dog 2 showers within 3 weeks & it worked at first. But now she's hella shedding again, pretty bummed my return value price dropped, so I guess I'm stuck with this crap for now
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us... needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: This works well when used right. We had a sample from our vet which didn't seem to have the full impact we expected, and having read the product directions we know why. It is important to leave the product in for 5-10 minutes before rinsing. Who knew? Ok, everyone else, I suppose?
customer_reviews.author: JS-DS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product with conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical. But after use it really made a difference. I have a 5 year old chow chow and even though I normally comb out a ton of hair during bath time; this was beyond crazy. I used the conditioner also and it really helped since my dog has a super thick undercoat. I ended up with a giant mop of hair plus half a gallon of hair after combing through while drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells soooooo good!
customer_reviews.text: I just bathed my dogs this evening (3 - Dutch Shepherd, Malinois and Wirehaired pointer). I’ll brush them tomorrow to see how the deshedding goes. However, I wanted to review how great this shampoo smells! It’s the best smelling shampoo I’ve ever used for dogs. I didn’t notice much of the wet dog smell after the bath, but what I did notice is how good they smell! I even ( briefly) thought about using it for my own hair. So a shampoo that is pet friendly and smells so good? Great purchase. Their coats are so soft feeling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but doesn’t reduce shedding
customer_reviews.text: This dog shampoo smells good and lathers pretty well. It’s supposed to help reduce shedding. I don’t think it reduced my dogs shedding at all but it’s a decent shampoo for an at home dog bath.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent, great shampoo! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time yesterday and loved it. The scent was great, it sudsed up great and his coat is very soft and shiny. The jury is still out on the reduction of fur claim, but I have my fingers crossed. This will definitely be my dog shampoo of choice going forward.
customer_reviews.author: madsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for shedding problems!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my dog. She gets smelly quickly, but the scent wasn't strong enough. Maybe it is just my dog. Other than that, it is great! She doesn't shed too much but I did notice an improvement in that department. She does smell less and not as quickly. I also noticed that it helped her not be as dry.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling and does help remove dead hair.
customer_reviews.text: Was suprised how good this dog shampoo smells. I washed my 15 year old lab and did help remove the hair that was tough to get off her with just the brushes and speciality ones.
customer_reviews.author: rotwiler

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Smells awesome and works
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Use it for my shepherd and my lab. I lather them up then let it sit for like ten min. I brush them with the shampoo /conditioner on them to get out any loose fur... Then rinse and blow dry to get the remaining fur out. With the shampoo followed by the conditioner, they smell great and shedding was dramatically reduced.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.Y

customer_reviews.title: Help your clothes use this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siberian husky, I'm not comfortable taking her to the groomer right now because I'm immunocompromised and we're in the middle of a pandemic. So I decided to groom her myself and I used this, it really works. Definitely make sure to brush afterwards though.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dog wash
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good. It lathers pretty well. I do not feel that it moisturizes their coats but for a quick wash it works great. I have labs, which is a coarser coat than some breeds. This doesn't necessarily soften the coat but it does make it shinny. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Beam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shampoo!! Be sure to dilute it because it’s very sticky and strong. It does get a portion of the dead hair out but it smells amazing and also works good as an odor eliminating shampoo. For the price you cannot bear it!! The local pet store markets it at $14.99 and its outrageous so I always buy my bottle from here instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: After ONE (YES!!! just 1) wash, our dogs look SOOOO shiny and feel wonderfully soft! This shampoo helped and continues to help tremendously with shedding! I first washed them about May 29th and almost 4 weeks later they still look and feel amazing! Oh, and they're outside dogs too! I'm absolutely floored with the results! Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for long haird dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great product, lets the hair easily fall off the dogs. I ordered 3 shampoo couple days ago and got two shampoos and one conditioner today. I would like to complain but I guess I can't, I have enough to get the dog done today and amazon said they are sending another out and dont want the conditioner back. Amazon might not be prefect but they aways seem to fix there problems.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Smells Delicious and you can't beat the price! A++
customer_reviews.text: I rescue and rehabilitate abused Pit Bulls and Fighting Dogs. As you know they are short haired. This is far better then any brand I have purchased from $40/ bottle to prescribed and otherwise. The Smell and the way the coat feels afterwards is excellent. I will say since he is short haired that brushing is necessary so the hair will not fall off in the house, but it just keeps me reminded that I should be brushing him anyway after a bath!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product!
customer_reviews.text: These furminator products have been a life saver! My little chiweenie she’s so much. The dog groomer described how this worked and recommended it. It changes the PH so the excess hair falls out & wow it does. Takes 1-3 days for it all to come off but it’s effective. Just periodic brushing a over a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Alisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Hands down awesome
customer_reviews.text: Can I give it 10 stars? I brushed my dog 2 days before using the shampoo. I use the Furminator brush. I got all of the hair off that I could. I used the shampoo. Waited until the next day and brushed again. No joke I got at least 3 times the amount of hair as before. Amazing. Will definitely buy again. It smells awesome too and is moisturizing when using.
customer_reviews.author: carey h

customer_reviews.title: Groomer
customer_reviews.text: Had dog at groomer and paid extra for the better shampoo and conditioner. Unfortunately for them, they displayed what they used, this product. Have bought multiple bottles and love it. Use both shampoo and conditioner. Wait the 10 minutes soak time for shampoo time and conditioner time. You will be rewarded with soft hair like a puppy. This being said on my 10 years old golden lab.
customer_reviews.author: TWorts

customer_reviews.title: Dont use if sensitive skin, shame.
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame because I've always raved about furminator products, however this one caused me and everyone in my house to have skin reactions. I do have chronic skin issues, but others who don't also had reactions. One of my 4 dogs had a reaction to it as well. I have to not recommend it due to this issue. I can't quite pinpoint what ingredient caused this reaction. The scent is not great, but it does seem to perfume the dogs for a while so might be good for more stinky dogs. Works well for deshedding, it's just all around unforunate. Thought I would warn others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the scent is fine. The extra oils are great for the one ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, a Newf, a Sheltie mix, and a mutt with short hair. The amount of hair that came off them after using this and the conditioner, was bananas. I brush all my dogs a couple times a week, and use a velocity dryer. The amount of shedding after baths with these products was certainly lessened for a couple of weeks. No one got dried out, and the scent is fine. The extra oils are great for the one with dry skin, and helped detangle the newf. I'd buy these again for sure. Though now I'm looking at the bulk jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I have a couple different shampoos and conditioners I use on my pup who is a (takes a breath) Australian Cattle Dog, Labrador Retriever, Cocker Spaniel and Maltese mix. She has fur similar in my opinion to a lab but there is some cocker in her fur too so she sheds... a lot... I use this with the conditioner and after she is all dry, we use the FURminator brush. Since adding this to her grooming stash we've noticed her shedding has taken over less and my allergies are very happy! Love this product and how it helps with lessening her shedding AND the matching conditioner leaves her feeling so silky soft!
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

product_meta.title: FURminator deShedding Ultra Premium Dog Shampoo to Reduce Shedding
product_meta.description: Size:16-OunceAs creators of the FURminator deShedding Tool, FURminator continues to raise the bar with innovative, proprietary shedding solutions. The FURminator lineup of deShedding tools, grooming tools, hair care products, bathing and hygiene solutions broadens and enhances the FURminator deShedding experience for pet parents and their pets. Simply put, there is no pet care solution on the market like the FURminator product line. FURminator deShedding Ultra Premium Shampoo reduces excessive shedding by reducing the undercoat during the bath. This shampoo contains no parabens or chemical dyes. Enriched with Omega 3 & 6 Fatty Acids, Calendula extract and Papaya Leaf Extract, you and your pup will both appreciate this shampoo. Bathing is an important part of your dog's grooming routine by helping to promote healthy skin and coat. Use monthly as part of the FURminator at home grooming regimen. For best results use in conjunction with a FURminator conditioner. Check out the rest of the FURminator line today!
feature_bullets: Packaging may vary. Furminator deShedding Ultra Premium Shampoo
Enriched with Omega 3 and 6 Fatty Acids, Calendula Extract, and Papaya Leaf Extract
Use monthly as part of the Furminator at-home professional grooming regiment
